name: Bear Hunt? (Bear Week 2016 Game Jam)
description:
'Bear Hunt?' is a game in which you play a lovely bear that is being attacked by evil hunters. What are you going to do about it?

Created in ~3.5 hours for the #bearweek2016 game jam! :)

Instructions

  • Use the arrow keys to move the bear.
  • Attack hunters by running into them.
  • Avoid hunter bullets.
